title: [SEV-2] Check-then-act buffer ownership race
description:
Automated alert triggered by monitoring.

**Service:** zed
**Pattern:** RACE-001

**Triggering Metrics:**
- buffer_conflicts_total: > 0
- buffer_lock_retries_total: anomaly detected
- buffer_acquisition_duration_seconds: anomaly detected


**Potential Impact:**
- User-facing service degradation
- Buffer operations failing intermittently
- Estimated 156 users affected

**Runbook:** https://docs.internal/runbooks/distributed-system-failures
